title: Plumbing & Sanitary Services
description: All your Plumbing and Sanitary-related problems will be taken care of by GreehoSheba marketplace.

faq.question: Does accessories cost included in service charge?
faq.answer: No, additional materials and parts cost are excluded from service charge.

faq.question: Is the plumbers trained?
faq.answer: Yes, we train all the plumber then give permission to work.

faq.question: Do I have to pay any charge if i don't take any service after calling?
faq.answer: If you don’t avial any plumbing and sanitary service after provided technician reach at your doorstep then you only have to pay the visiting charge which is BDT 100.

title: Gas Stove/Burner Repair
description: When a gas stove breaks down it requires urgent servicing. Now you don’t have to go out and search for gas stove servicing centers. At GreehoSheba you will find doorstep expert gas stove servicing and repairing.

title: Lock Mechanic
description: If get locked to your home/outside, and door lock or any kind of lock, you can search on GreehoSheba to find a experiensed mechanic

faq.question: Do I need to buy the paint?
faq.answer: Actually no. Our service provider will buy the paint according to your preference. However, this might differ if you have chosen to supply paint by yourself. Product costs shall be provided in advance where applicable.

faq.question: Do I need to pay for extra labor?
faq.answer: For every service we will assign a proper number of laborers to complete it on time. But if you want extra labor in order to complete it early then you have to pay for extra labor.
